name: endurain
description: Endurain is a self-hosted training log for endurance sports such as running and cycling. It tracks workouts, distances, and performance metrics over time, giving athletes insight into their training volume and trends.

features.title: Training Log
features.description: Track workouts for running and cycling. Comprehensive activity records

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor distance, pace, and progress. Data-driven training

features.title: Trend Analysis
features.description: Visualize training volume over time. Understand your improvement

features.title: Endurance Focus
features.description: Designed specifically for endurance athletes. Speaks your language

features.title: Personal Records
features.description: Track PRs and achievements. Celebrate your progress

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep your training data private. Your fitness, your control
